content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DeleteIAMPolicy path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/stack/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/iam/policy content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete a stacks iam policy
responses
title: 28_Stack Policies_DeleteIAMPolicy_163.json
